mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, create_date, writerId) value(#{board.title}, #{board.content}, curdate(), #{board.writerId});
mapper.update: update board set isDeleted = 1 where id = #{id};
update board set content = #{board.content} where id = #{board.id};
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from board where isDeleted = 0
select * from board where isDeleted = 0 order by id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end};
select * from board where isDeleted = 0 and title = #{title};
select * from board where isDeleted = 0 and id = #{boardId};
